titles.title: Prohibiting Members of the House of Representatives from soliciting campaign funds on any day on which the House is in session.
Prohibiting Members of the House of Representatives from soliciting campaign funds on any day on which the House is in session.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ethics.

bill.summary: Amends Rule XXIII (Code of Official Conduct) of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a Member, Delegate, or Resident Commissioner from soliciting any funds in connection with an election for federal, state, or local office on any day that the House is in session. Excludes days on which the House convenes solely in a pro forma session.
